details.title: Object identification based on filtering

authors.affiliation: Code 6362, US Naval Research Lab, Washington, DC 20375, USA
authors.name: Thomas L. Carroll

authors.affiliation: Code 6362, US Naval Research Lab, Washington, DC 20375, USA
authors.name: Frederic J. Rachford

details.abstract: The authors use an acoustic experiment to test a method for identifying radar or sonar targets based on information from the target's impulse response function. The new algorithm uses a long modulated pulse of relatively low resolution. Using concepts from the field of dynamics, the algorithm measures the similarity between a signal reflected from a target and a previously recorded reference. The authors conducted acoustic experiments with some simple objects to validate the algorithm, although the actual target identification method could be used for radar or sonar.

ieee.title: Target identification based on state space analysis
ieee.displayText: Thomas L. Carroll, Frederic J. Rachford, "Target identification based on state space analysis", Radar Conference 2014 IEEE, pp. 0032-0037, 2014.
